verbs.description: In a not - exactly shocking conclusion , NBC [V: has] cleared NBC of having a culture that tolerated and excused sexual harassment at the network . Though NBC had no problem exonerating itself , the journalists at the network scoffed when House Republicans found no evidence of collusion for GOP President Donald Trump .
